scripts.install: docker-compose exec -u www-data -T php composer install --working-dir=GestionApi
scripts.composer:require: docker-compose exec -u www-data -T php composer require --working-dir=GestionApi
scripts.phpqa: npm run phpqa:stop && npm run phpqa:build && npm run phpqa:run && npm run phpqa:exec && npm run phpqa:stop
scripts.phpqa:exec: docker exec -i phpqa-GestionApi sh -c 'cd /app && phpqa --report --ignoredDirs vendor,build,migrations,test,bin,var,public --ignoredFiles config/bootstrap.php --tools phpmetrics:0,phpcs:0,phpcs:0,phpmd:0,phpcpd:0,phpstan:0,psalm:0,security-checker:0,parallel-lint:0'
scripts.phpqa:stop: docker stop phpqa-GestionApi || true && docker rm -f phpqa-GestionApi || true
scripts.phpcsf: docker-compose exec -u www-data -T php bash -c "cd GestionApi && vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix"
scripts.phpunit: docker-compose exec -u www-data -T php bash -c "cd GestionApi && php bin/phpunit"
scripts.sy:co: docker-compose exec -u www-data -T php php GestionApi/bin/console
